channel.title: HEY GUYS:d HELP IF YOU COULD!
channel.description: [b][size=10pt]So.. i am very new to this whole rs coding thing:D and i am working of blank source and client. and i was wondering, how come alot of items show as "nulls" and skillcapes and godswords. you know, the stuff that EVERY1 wants :D if you guys dont mind helpin out on maybe little tut or hints and i will make sure to add each and every1 of you in CREDITS! thanks guys:)[/size][/b]

item.title: HEY GUYS:d HELP IF YOU COULD!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I’m missing something… what do you want exactly?

Read full topic
item.source: HEY GUYS:d HELP IF YOU COULD!

item.title: HEY GUYS:d HELP IF YOU COULD!
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

you need to find the modls somewhere on the internet. (or take from another client) and then add the ints for the item.
ints go in your class8.java clientside and should look more or less like this

if(i == 12128) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New Option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 100; class8.anInt174 = 14405;//Drop Model Number class8.anInt181 = 1500;//Scale - Increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 280;//Model Rotation - Vertical(like a backflip) class8.anInt198 = 100;//Model Rotation - Horizontal - Increase turns clockwise class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2;//Offset - Increase to move right class8.anInt194 = 56;//Offset - Increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 14406;//Wield Model Number - Male class8.anInt200 = 14406;//Wield Model Number - Female class8.anInt188 = -1;//Male Arms/Sleeves class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female Arms/Sleeves class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "The firy Sword";//Name of the item class8.aByteArray178 = "Legendary Sword".getBytes();//Description of the item (when you "examine" it) }

(firey sword is just a custom on my server. i just picked this one cause it has the description for each string)
youll just have to play arround and figure how your paticular client is formatted for these. but basics are the same.

string165
string200
and string 174 are the most important ones

good luck!! im in the same boat with you im new too

Read full topic
item.source: HEY GUYS:d HELP IF YOU COULD!
